desc: 测试插入出差本表以及行程子表
name: InsertTravelSelfAndTrip

oqls.desc: 插入出差记以及行程（带变量）
oqls.name: InsertTravelAndTripVars
oqls.oql: insert into Travel(applyId, applyName, TravelTrip(creator, modifier)) values (#{applyId}, #{applyName}, #{trips})
oqls.detailSql: insert into TRAVEL_TRIP(CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_KEY, MODIFIER_NAME, MODIFIER_KEY, APPLY_ID) values (#{creator.name}, #{creator.key}, #{modifier.name}, #{modifier.key}, #{applyId})
